ingredient.name: Ginger
ingredient.description: Traditional digestive herb with proven anti-inflammatory and motility benefits

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Promotes beneficial bacteria growth and reduces pro-inflammatory species
Increases SCFA-producing bacteria while reducing pathogenic bacteria

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Reduces gut inflammation and stimulates digestive enzymes and motility

symptom_effects.population_notes: Reduces nausea and vomiting with improved gastric emptying and decreased bloating

citations.title: Gut microbiota variation with ginger juice
